title: Snake-Java-Game
description: A simple, classic Snake game implemented in Java using Swing. Move the snake, eat food, grow longer, and try not to collide with walls or yourself

title: TheNetWorkCo-Leave-Form

title: Flower-recognition
description: A simple end-to-end workflow for training and evaluating a convolutional neural network (CNN) to classify flower images. The project is centered around an interactive Jupyter Notebook, covering data loading, augmentation, training, evaluation, and basic inference.
